item.title: Git(Hub), Hugo and Academic
item.description: A quick(ish) tutorial on how I created my personal but work related website using Git(Hub), Hugo and Academic on a Mac. The process came from two main sources: 1. The documentation for Academic and; 2. A blog post by George Cushen. So what did I do: I already had Git installed and you will need it too. Then install Hugo. There are several options but I used the Tarball method.
